TunableEnum.name: DRINK_COURSE

TunableList.name: FOOD_COURSES
TunableList.description: A List of all the courses to search through in order to find what an NPC will order.

TunableEnum.description: A food course that an NPC can order.

TunableList.name: NPC_ORDER_MAP
TunableList.description: A mapping of tags to weighted tests. If an item on the menu has the designated tag, it will start with the tuned base weight and then each passing test will add the tested-weight to the total weight for that food object. Once all food objects have been weighed for a given category (apps, entrees, etc.), a weighted random determines the winner.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: If the food item has this tag, we will apply the corresponding base weight to it and the sum of the weights of any passing tests run on this object.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: The base weight and weighted tests to run.

Tunable.name: base_weight
Tunable.description: The base weight of this food object. Even if no tests pass, this weight will be applied for use with the weighted random selection.

TunableList.name: weighted_tests
TunableList.description: A list of tests and weights. For each passed test, the corresponding weight is added to the base weight of the food object.

TunableTuple.description: Tests and weights. If the test passes, the weight is added to the base weight of the food object.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A list of tests groups. At least one must pass all its sub- tests to pass the TestSet. ORs of ANDs

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: The weight to add to the base weight of the food object if the corresponding tests pass. A negative value is valid.

Tunable.name: WATER_ORDER_FOR_BACKUP
Tunable.description: A reference to the water order that should be available when nothing else is available.
